paused, and false otherwise."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"redeemOrBurnPiNFT(address,uint256,address,address,address,bool)":{"params":{"_collectionAddress":"The address of the collection.","_erc20Contract":"The address of the deposited validator funds.","_erc20Receiver":"The receiver of the validator funds after the function call.","_nftReceiver":"The receiver of the nft after the function call.","_tokenId":"The Id of the token.","burnNFT":"Boolean to determine redeeming or burning."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct piNFTMethods.Commission storage ref))
mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct piNFTMethods.Commission storage ref))
mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct piNFTMethods.Commission storage ref))
mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct piNFTMethods.Commission storage ref))
mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct piNFTMethods.Commission storage ref))

params._erc20Contract: The address of the funds to be repaid.
The address of the funds being deposited.
params._value: The amount of funds being deposited.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._erc20Contract: The address of the deposited validator funds.
params._erc20Receiver: The receiver of the validator funds after the function call.
params._nftReceiver: The receiver of the nft after the function call.
params.burnNFT: Boolean to determine redeeming or burning.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params._erc20Address: The address of the funds to be fetched.

params._amount: The amount of funds being withdrawn.
params._erc20Contract: The address of the funds being withdrawn.

Repay(address,uint256,address,uint256).notice: Repays the withdrawn validator funds and transfers back token on full repayment.

addERC20(address,uint256,address,uint256.notice: Allows the validator to deposit funds to validate the piNFT.

redeemOrBurnPiNFT(address,uint256,addres.notice: Allows the nft owner to redeem or burn the piNFT.

viewBalance(address,uint256,address).notice: Returns the specified ERC20 balance of the token.

viewWithdrawnAmount(address,uint256).notice: Fetches the withdrawn amount for a token.

withdraw(address,uint256,address,uint256.notice: Allows the nft owner to lock the piNFT in the contract and withdraw validator funds.
